title: Perm chat filter?
body:
Just curious as to why I seem to have a permanent chat filter in game, I checked the options and the filter is off. 
But everything in game still gets filtered, assuming this is riots doing?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} Not that big of a deal really, just curious.

replies.body:
I think I unchecked mine, and I don't think I've ever noticed any star signs or other random symbols replacing the texts in my chat log if my memory serves me right, hence I'd say that it's working at least as far as I would know.

Idk what may be happening in your client there though. Maybe try the good o' restarting and client repair or something.

That said, I'm on legacy client. Not sure if that actually makes a difference but which one are you on? Maybe they only put this on the new client or something idk, who knows.

Beta client is bugged and the filter doesn't work properly, though the filter now also filters a lot more than the legacy filter, things like damn or bastard are filtered now. So hooray for riot a permanent 30% word filter, poeple can go fuckfuckfuckfuck and have the whole lot filtered isnt that great.

Well, that makes sense. 
I had a feeling it was just something to do with riot or the client.
